title-group.article-title: Reading "The Human Stain" through Charles W. Chesnutt: The Genre of the Passing Novel

abstract.p: This article historicizes The Human Stain, placing it in the genre of the passing novel. The analysis is filtered through a reading of Chesnutt s passing fictions, particularly The House behind the Cedars and The Quarry.
